name: Lark Rise Farm Walks (Route 4 - Red Markers)

ai.summary: A 10.3 km moderate hike following Route 4 (Red Markers) through rural farmland in the UK. The route offers countryside views, gentle gradients, and farm track surfaces.
ai.terrain_summary: Expect a mix of farm tracks, grassy field paths, and occasional uneven ground. Some stiles and gates may require light scrambling. Mud is possible after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight; wear sturdy footwear and dress for variable conditions. Respect livestock and gates; keep to markers; carry a map or GPS, water, and a basic first aid kit; watch for muddy or slippery surfaces and uneven ground; let someone know your plan if walking solo.
recommended_gear: Lightweight rain shell or waterproof jacket
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn (roughly March to October).
